Effortlessly Save and Export Your Open Tabs

Are you tired of manually copying URLs from your open tabs or losing them when you close your browser? This URL Copier Extension makes saving and exporting URLs from your open tabs a breeze!

URL Copier allows you to:

- Quickly save all your open tab URLs with just one click.
- Export your URLs to a CSV file for easy organization and sharing.

Whether you're a researcher collecting sources, a digital marketer managing multiple campaigns, or simply someone who wants to save interesting articles for later, URL Copier is the perfect tool to simplify your workflow and boost productivity.

Follow these easy steps to start using URL Copier:

1) Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2) Click on the URL Copier icon in your browser toolbar.
3) Watch as your open tab URLs are instantly saved to a CSV file, ready for you to download.

Never lose a valuable URL again, and keep your tabs organized with URL Copier. Download it now and take control of your browsing experience!
